mema batahira kuli hewayan ha samajaya idiriye boru pandithamaniwa wisimata kamaththak dakwana eeniya prabuddhayan danata dashaka thukata pera sita dodawanne demala janayata sidu wu asadharana kam walata piliyam yediya yuthu bawayi.prabhakaran kisida paradawiya nohaki yayi param ba owun prabhakarange parajayen pasu ada pawasanne yuda peramune parajaya magin prathipalaya nathi kara damiya haki wuwath eyata mulika wu mula hethu walata waha wisandum diya yuthu bawayi.ese nowunahoth idiriyedi thawath prabhakaranla dusim gananin bihi wiya haki bawayi.me niwatayan prabhakaran sitina thak ohu pilibandawada asthana biyak athi kala ayuruth ,prabhakaran yanu kisi daka parajaya kala nohaki surya diwya rajaya lesath handinwu ayuruth amathaka nokala yuthuya.ee anuwama yamin mowun ada anagathayedi bihi wana prabhakaranla gana pawasamin thama mithya mathaya dinawimata kasa kawathi.eyin samajaya biya ganwannata thath karathi.
